mapper.select: WITH SortedNews AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY reg_Dt ASC, SEQ) AS newsSeq, SEQ, title_kr, source, reg_Dt FROM news_info ) SELECT newsSeq, SEQ, title_kr, source, reg_Dt FROM SortedNews ORDER BY newsSeq DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{recordCountPerPage};
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 10) AS total_pages FROM news_info;
SELECT SEQ, title_Kr, cn_kr, file_name, reg_dt, edt_dt, reg_id, edt_id FROM news_info WHERE SEQ = #{srch3};
